headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin to control electromagnetic lock via Raspberry Pi GPIO pins connected to relay.

lockPin.title: Lock GPIO pin
lockPin.description: pin for unlocking lock (use Rpi numbering)

doorPin.title: Reed switch GPIO pin
doorPin.description: pin for reed switch (use Rpi numbering)

activeLow.title: Relay activated by low state?
activeLow.description: true: relay activated by low state (0), false: relay activated by high state (1), affects lockPin

unlockingDuration.title: Unlocking duration (seconds)
unlockingDuration.description: how long lockPin should be active (seconds), default: 40

pollingInterval.title: Polling interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: how often to be polled (seconds), default: 2
